channel.title: CVE Feed for nicdark -- Cost Calculator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nicdark -- Cost Calculator

item.title: CVE-2023-1155|2024-08-02T05:40:58.017Z -- nicdark -- cost%20calculator
item.description: The Cost Calculator plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the nd_cc_meta_box_cc_price_icon parameter in versions up to, and including, 1.8 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
